solution_line_template: First find the number of mice the snake eats each year: {weeks_per_year} weeks/year / {weeks_per_mouse} weeks/mouse = <<{weeks_per_year}/{weeks_per_mouse}={mice_per_year}>>{mice_per_year} mice/year

Then multiply the number of mice the snake eats per year by the number of years per decade to find the number of mice it eats per decade: {mice_per_year} mice/year * {years_per_decade} years/decade = <<{mice_per_year}*{years_per_decade}={mice_per_decade}>>{mice_per_decade} mice/decade
